title: MAHAFAKA ANAO IZY

verses.1:
'Zao no hafatra malaza indrindra
Nanakoako hatry ny taloha
Nohirain'izao tontolo izao
"Andriamanitray dia mahafaka anao"
verses.2:
'Zao no hafatra malaza indrindra
Eran-tany sy ranomasina
Mbola tantarao indray
"Andriamanitray dia mahafaka anao"
verses.3:
'Zao no hafatra malaza indrindra
Ho an'ny mpanota sy meloka
Mijere sy minoa ny Tompo
"Andriamanitray dia mahafaka anao"

chorus:
Izy dia mahafaka anao (in-2)
Na dia vesarin'ota aza
"Andriamanitray dia mahafaka anao"
